title: Funding opportunity: International Travel Award Scheme for the Biological Sciences
organization: Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council
description: Last updated: 27 February 2025 - see all updates Apply for funding to visit international partners, to initiate collaborations, prepare joint funding proposals, visit overseas facilities or attend European consortia-building events. You must be an existing Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC)-supported researcher in order to apply for funding.
